channel.title: Movies Reviews
channel.description: Many people love to watch movies but some people don't get a chance to watch movie. Some people love to read movie reviews first and watch the movie later. We reviews many movies and music videos.

item.description: Here is a sweet story about Christmas Time movie. Robert is 23 years old who attending university at out of state. He can't wait to go back home for Christmas break.

channel.item: <title >Shining Forest https://github.com/bsang/WDF---Project/blob/gh-pages/Sang_Biak_Lab_07/rss_link.html There are two brothers in the forest and they don't want to return home for some reason.

item.description: The prophet have told many people about the second coming of Christ. But they don't believe him and they don't want to repent their sins infront of God.
